dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: burning sun FLARES LENS, beating down on... A MAN. Lying in the barren DESERT. Out cold. Handsome... but HAR We'll call him THE MAN IN BLACK, the color of his dirty c

A PINK TONGUE LICKS HIM. The man STARTS AWAKE -- to find MONGREL DOG over him. Mangy. But sweet. COUGHING, the man stumbles up. How'd he get here? And whe the hell i.: here? And -- OWWW. A GASH in his side... .. part of the wound oddly SEARED. He winces. Trying to s this painful puzzle. Something GLINTS on his wrist: A STEEL BRACELET. No clasp to pull it off. He touches the surface -- TSSS -- SHIT -- It's HOT! And there's a BLACK STETSON on the ground. The Man grabs shield his eyes... but STOFS: A WORN PHOTOGRAPH in the inner brim. A WOMAN. Young, beautiful. SMILING. The Man stares: does he KNOW this woman? is this even HIS The dog BARKS ALERT. The man turns -- QUICK -- his hand r toward his hip on INSTINCT but there's no holster. NO GUN

dialogues.speaker: THREE RIDERS ON HORSEBACK ARE COMING OVER THE RISE
dialogues.text: THE CLAIBORNE BROTHERS -- WES, MOSE and LUKE. Dusty and t Wes gallops right up to our Man, gives him the once over

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Howdy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're riding towards Absolution. You know how far west we are? The Man's got NO IDEA what he's talking about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe he's a dummy. Wes hops off his horse, right in The Man's face now --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There a reason you don't wanna answer my question, friend? And now, Mose nods to the BRACELET on The Man's wrist --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wes, he's got iron on his wrist... and he's been shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bet he's a chain jumper. Luke spurs his horse behind him -- The Man's SURROUNDED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If he escaped, there'll be a bounty. Let's bring him with us. Wes nods as he slides a SAWED-OFF DOUBLE-BARREL from his scabbard. COCKS both barrels. The dog GROWLS --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not your lucky day, Stranger -- turn round and start walking. But The Man doesn't move. The Claibornes share glances. W steps forward -- RAISING HIS RIFLE --

dialogues.speaker: WES CLAIBORNE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Dead or alive, no difference. I said

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE MAN MOVES, A MECHANISM OF BRUTAL VIOLENCE -- YANKS th forward as BLAMI -- shot goes WILD -- suddenly the gun's MAN'S HANDS -- BLAXI Wes is BLOWN backwards, HOLE IN HIS As Hose draws his Enfield, The Man FLIPS the rifle again SLAM! MOSE FLIES OFF HIS SADDLE as The Man rolls -- UNDER Luke's horse -- GRABBING Luke's ankle -- suddenly Luke's his back -- BREATHLESS, staring UP at the double-barrel:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- P-please, God -- d-don't -- -- The Man PULLS the trigger but CLICK! The rifle's EMPTY Luke's RELIEF is short as The Man SLAMS the gun-butt down knocking him out cold. And ALL of this took about ten sec This man is a cold-blooded KILLER. But somehow... he didn seem to KNOW that. CONFUSION. Drops the rifle, looks down his hands... covered in BLOOD. And the BODIES in his wake The WIND loosens a piece of PAPER from Wes's jacket. It D on the breeze -- flattens against The Stranger's foot. He it up, BLOODY FINGERPRINTS on what we now see is a TELEGR

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: (a hoarse whisper) Absolution...

dialogues.speaker: SLAM TO MOMENTS LATER
dialogues.text: With a HYA! The Man sends two horses GALLOPING, mounts th third, wincing at that gash in his side. Starts to trot o sees the dog following...

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Get outta here. Leave me alone. But the dog keeps following. Like they're FRIENDS now. Th turns away dismissively as we BOOM UP to reveal the WIDE VALLEY below... and a SPECK within it that is:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CROOKED SIGN: "ABSOLUTION." The town is dismal and forg Crumbling buildings blistered by sun. The Man rides in -- dehydrated, the wound DRAINING him. His eyes fall on the first building he sees... A CHURCH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BAM! The door flies open and VOTIVE CANDLES FLICKER. The looks at the dog and says --

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: Stay. The dog sits by the door as The Man enters -- EMPTY -- he moving -- into a small kitchen area -- bottle of whiskey uncorks it with his teeth -- drinks -- pours some on the then A PISTOL COCKS behind him -- Meet MEACHAM, town preacher, a tough, wash-foot Baptist:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Palms to heaven, Friend. The Man freezes. Turns up his hands.

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: Been shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only two kinds of men get shot -- criminals and victims. (steps forward; hard) Which one're you?

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: don't know. Meacham hears the HONESTY in his voice. Knows a lost soul he sees one. Lowers his gun, softening...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got a name, son?

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: Don't know that either.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you know?

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: (a beat; then) ... English. Off Meacham, INTRIGUED -- we CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CANDLE FLAME -- a NEEDLE passing through it -- it's LAT Meacham's studying The Man's wound:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Odd wound. Looks... cauterized. (off The Man's look) Means somethin' burned it half closed. The Man just stares. News to him. And now, as Meacham lea over the wound, the METAL CROSS around his neck begins to twitch... lifting ever so SLIGHTLX off his chest -- towar strange BRACELET on the Man's wrist. Meacham reacts --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice trick. That some kinds... magnet? The Man looks at him -- "What the hell is a 'magnet'?!?" Meacham shrugs it off, readies the needle --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try'n hold still. He pokes the hot needle through the wound -- The Man winc slightly, but bears the pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where'd you ride in from?

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: West. Woke up in the desert. Looking up at the sun like I'd been dropped outta the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seems I remember a story about that happening once... fella by the name of Lucifer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How 'bout I just call you "Luke," for short. But TheMan's distracted by his REFLECTION in a cracked mi his own face unfamiliar. Meacham nods towards The Man's H

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That blood yours or somebody else's?

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: Three men rode up. Drew on me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My hands... moved on their own.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything else you wanna confess to while you got my attention? And The Man senses somehow that, ygg, there is... but:

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: Everything that happened before I woke up... (shakes his head) It's gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well. Too bad. Can't absolve you for your sins if you don't recall 'em. That bein' said... Meacham looks up, eyes twinkling. This is not a fire n' brimstone preacher. This is a guy who GETS IT --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I seen bad men do good things and good men do bad things. Whether you end up in heaven or hell... it's not God's plan... it's yours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You just got to remember what it was. The Man considers. Darkly --

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: What if I don't want to remember?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then you're probl'y goin' to hell. On cue -- SMASH!!! The stained glass window EXPLODES as a MOLOTOV COCKTAIL hurtles into the church. FIRE spreads ar the pews -- MEACHAM ACTIVATES -- tears curtains off the confessional and uses them to STAMP OUT the fire --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dammit -- it's Dolarhyde's men! WHOOPS and HOLLERS and GUNSHOTS outside! The Man whirls t A DOZEN MEN ON HORSEBACK, marauding through town --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their leader is PERCY DOLARHYDE, a cocky, hot-tempered ba he ignites another Molotov, hurls it at the CLAIMS OFFICE

dialogues.speaker: CLAIM TO LAND AROUND HERE'S THE ONE WITH
dialogues.text: HiS NAME ON IT! The gang rides down Main Street, HOOTING -- Percy cocks a Molotov, aiming for the SALOON -- But one of his men, half-Apache NAT COLORADO, shouts:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Percy! N2t the saloon!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why the goddamn hell not?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cause your dady said so. Something LOADED in the way he emphasizes "daddy." Percy -- strange RESENTMENT between them. With a growl, Percy G OFF, chucks the flaming bottle onto the CHURCH STEPS:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meacham finishes putting out the fire, grabbing a couple blankets as he moves past The Man --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wanna help or are you just gonna stand there and burn?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FRIGHTENED TOWNSPEOPLE run for the sanctuary of the churc Meacham SWATS OUT the fire on the steps --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, folks -- don't panic! Get inside and you'll be fine... C'mon... Meacham tosses The Man one of the blankets, nods across t street to the GENERAL STORE which is just STARTING to bur

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put it out before it gets goin'! ON THE MAN, not sure how he suddenly became the damn fire brigade, but HUSTLING across the street to --

WHIPS open the blanket, beats at the flames advancing tow roof -- PUTS THE FIRE OUT as the door FLIES OPEN and out A KID. 11. Rough n' tumble. And right now, mouth full of LICORICE. Two FULL JARS of CANDY in his hands. OOPS:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just tryin' to save the candy. (SWALLOWS, worried now) You one of my Pa's hired guns? Before he can answer, HOOFBEATS behind them -- and here's He yanks the reins, pulls his REVOLVER on our Man --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who the hell're yam? Whatever the opposite of Love At First Sight is, THIS is

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nobody is right. You think you can just collect your fifty dollars and ride off? You signed up for the wrong side, boy. The kid's scared. The Man ISN'T, despite the gun in his f

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell you what. You get down on your knees and kiss my boot. The Man's eyes narrow --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You do that and I'll let you run back to wherever the hell you came from so you can tell whoever you see... (cocks his gun) Absolution belongs -tg..th-e- 1Dolar es.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want me to kiss your boot? Percy extends his boot just INCHES from The Man's face:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tongue's just fine if you're feelin' amorous. Don't hold ba -- THWIP! The Man YANKS Percy's boot off his foot in one qui move and KWHAM!!!1 WINGS IT RIGHT INTO PERCY'S FACE! Percy FLIES off the HORSE -- The Man grabbing his rifle - moment Percy lands, it's STICKING into his NECK:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kiss this, you sonofa --

dialogues.speaker: -- PUT IT DOWN
dialogues.text: -- Nat Colorado gallops around the corner, SHOTGUN RAISED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamnit, Nat -- SHOOT HIM!!! -- but The Man yanks Percy up by his collar, using him as SHIELD between himself and Colorado. Eerily calm --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wherever you came from? Go back. Colorado knows he's dealing with a PROFESSIONAL. MORE GAN MEMBERS ride up, surprised -- a dirty outlaw, GREAVEY, ba

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sheriff's right behind us, Nat!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You goddamned shitheels! Don't you even THINK about leavin' me!!!! Colorado -- DECISION -- doesn't take long -- glares at Th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be seeing you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look forward to it. With that, Nat spurs his horse -- YA! The others follow h he RIDES HARD out of town. Percy growls at The Man --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are a dead man. You hear me? So help me God I will kill you my-- DM! The Man's SMASHES Percy's skull with the gun, knockin OUT COLD, as LAWMEN approach on horseback --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FA! He caught Percy Dolarhyde! SHERIFF KYLE TAGGART rears up on his horse. Tall, dark an handsome despite a SADNESS in his eyes, already dismounti

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Emmett -- you all right? The Kid (now EMMETT) strides towards his father excitedly

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: a-f lap jack- then-stared-down-Nat-Colorado- like-he-wasn't-even-scared!!!! Taggart turns to The Man now, cautious, but grateful --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pardon my boy, mister. He can be excitable. (puts out his hand) Kyle Taggart. The Man shakes Taggart's hand. A beat. Then --

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: . Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well I'm in your debt, Luke. Tune of fifty dollars, actually. (off The Man's look) Our advert? The telegram? The Man NODS -- Oh, RIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: SHERIFF TAGGART, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Could use a man like you in case any of 'em come back...

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: -- I'm just passing through.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fair enough. You don't mind spending the night, bank opens in the morning... I'll get you your money then. (nods down the street) Saloon's got rooms. You just tell Maria I sent you. The Man tips his hat, nods to Emmett (still STARSTRUCK), to go. Taggart furrows his brow as the DOG scampers after

dialogues.speaker: SHERIFF TAGGART, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You here with the prospector woman? The Man stops. Intrigued. Turns back --

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: woman?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yup. Real looker. Came into town yesterday with that there dog. She a friend of yours?
ON THE MAN. His first real LEAD.

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: Maybe. And as The Man heads off, we HOLD ON TAGGART, his spidey- tingling that all is not RIGHT with this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Somethin' wrong, Kyle?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that French sayin' where you swear you seen someone before?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't speak French.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... you sure's hell don't. Taggart takes one last look at The Man departing as we CU

dialogues.text: JUST LIKE THE APACHES IN OUR OPENING! Flies STRAIGHT UP, FRAME. Its PLAINTIVE MOO blending into all the others:

Behind the bar, a and WOMAN argue. DOC and MARIA; she's a buxom Mexican bea he's 300 roly-poly pounds of ANXIOUS CASTILIAN JEALOUSY:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- I know you are, don't lie to me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That mutt makes a move for my steak, I'll drill him down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up, Atticus. This is the man who took out Percy Dolarhyde. Atticus grumbles and goes back to eating, but not before sweeping his duster aside to show the GUN in his holster. rolls her eyes, sets a GLASS in front of The Man, who nod

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: I'm looking for a woman. She gestures to the WHORES --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What kind?

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: This kind. He removes the PHOTO from inside his hat. The one of the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never seen her before. But she is beautiful. (pours him whiskey; then one for herself) Here's to you finding her, Senor. ON THE MAN. Not exactly sure he WANTS to. But they CLINK glasses, knock 'em back. Maria pours him another:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have any idea what kind of mess you just stepped into?

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: No. But I figured I'd be safe in here seein' as how that boy I tossed off his horse didn't wanna burn your saloon. Maria's eyes go down. Somehow GUILTY. But then:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not the boy you should worry about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's his papa.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POV: UPSIDE DOWN, A MAN, surrounded by his RANCH HANDS -- FACE just out of the light, hat brim lowered under an oil

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Name's Woodrow Dolarhyde. I'm what you might call, the Tall Hog at the trough.
His face comes INTO light: 50's, tailored finery, patent Wellington boots that bespeak wealth. HARD. Exudes POWER:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're Roy, right? Clanton, is it? Been working for me two weeks now, and I haven't had the pleasure. Our POV belongs to ROY CLANTON, the ranch hand from the c abductions. TERRIFIED -- his arms and legs TIED TO THE SA OF TWO HORSES, kicking dirt in front of Dolarhyde's RANCH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Dolarhyde, I... I swear I didn't

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- a VIOLENT "SSST" from Dolarhyde JOSTLES the horses -- STRETCHING Roy tight enough to SNAP -- he SCREAMS --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Best not to interrupt me, Roy, makes the horses skittish.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You partial to history? Here's a primer,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls out a WHIP, gripping it by its STERLING SILVER H Starts CIRCLING the horses as he lets the whip UNFURL:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Following the War Of Northern Aggression -- what some ironically refer to as the "Civil" War -- came a prodigious nation- wide market for beef. Cowtowns sprang up all along these prairies, Roy; populated by enterprising young drovers -- among 'em, my daddy, Jeremiah Dolarhyde. Sold six of his gold teeth and a sword gifted to him by Robert E. Lee for twenty of the scrawniest Longhorns you ever saw -- then turned 'em into the fattest herd West of the Chisholm Trail. (stops: the WHIP) Watched him work this lash, driving those steer til his fingers bled... but what good's a whip without a herd, Roy? And slowly, torturously, SWEEPS the whip tip in the dirt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mr. Dolarhyde, Sir, you gotta believe me -- I went to take a piss and and -- saw a light in the sky -- blue -- and when I ran back the cows and fellas were gone!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sky. Opened up. And took my cows. Incoming HOOFBEATS -- Dolarhyde looks up to see COLORADO rest of the GANG returning from Absolution. A WOMAN emerges from the servant's quarters. APACHE. 50's Beautiful. As the men REAR, Nat Colorado MEETS EYES with A relationship we don't understand yet as Dolar strides u

dialogues.text: Where's Percy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jail. Sheriff locked him up. Dolar darkens. Unsheathes a KNIFE. Looks down at Roy:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When're these people gonna lgarn? He STABS the knife down... SLICING the rope tethered to R FEET. His lower body SLUMPS to the ground, he breathes a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dolar SLAPS the horse's rump, to which Roy's UPPER TORSO tied; it GALLOPS off, dragging a SCREAMING ROY into the n

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone saddle up. Got us a sheriff to kill. As he MOVES OFF, Dolarhyde's eyes go to the Apache Woman. Something passes between them. She seems CONCERNED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wasn't the sheriff, got him caught. It was a stranger. That STOPS Dolarhyde. He turns back, face dark:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... What stranger?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Usually a man gives off a scent. Where he's been. What he's done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He didn't have one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BULLET, in close up, twirling between the thumb and for of SHERIFF TAGGART. Boots up on his desk, TROUBLED. Deputy Wade pours himself a cup from a TIN POT OF COFFEE:

dialogues.speaker: DEPUTY CHARLIE WADE
dialogues.text: Percy wouldn't've come in shooting without his daddy's say-so, Kyle. You best get ready for a war 'cause that's what's comin'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tomorrow we ride the little shit up Phoenix way, turn him over. Dolarhyde's got a beef, he can take it up with the 6th cavalry. Taggart's on his feet, grabs his JACKET off the door --

dialogues.speaker: SHERIFF TAGGART, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Goddamn tired of this... fatass rancher scaring good people off their lan-- He STOPS. Something catches his eye on the posting board. YANKS a piece of paper off, a mixture of CONFUSION and CO

dialogues.speaker: SHERIFF TAGGART, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sonofabitch. WHAT DOES HE SEE? Before we get a chance to KNOW --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: EMMETT'S FACE rises into frame, peering into the saloon f below a windowsill. Sees THE MAN IN BLACK at the bar as -

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- he SLUGS back a shot, the dog at his feet, still eyein steak on Atticus' plate. The Man points to his GLASS:

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: Another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You drink like a man who wants to forget.

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: (haunted; the irony) Other way round. The dog WHINES AGAIN for the steak. Atticus SLAMS down hi silverware. Draws his GUN --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got three seconds to get your dog outta here or I blow his balls off.

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: (without a blink) Not my dog.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Q=... two... -- and just before "three"... CA-CLICK. Atticus FREEZES, because there's a RIFLE BARREL at the back of h,iS head n

dialogues.speaker: VOICE, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Give you odds you don't get to 'three.' RACK TO FIND the person holding the rifle is A WOMAN. Beautiful. EXOTIC. Dressed in leather. Meet ELLA SWENSON. ON THE MAN IN BLACK. Can't help himself. immediate and undeniable CHEMISTRY. But she pays him no mind -- makes a sound and the dog snaps to her side. Atticus uncocks his slowly slides it back in the holster --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was just havin' some fun, Miss --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give- him, the steak. Atticus HESITATES, angry at the humiliation. Ella PRESSES GUN HARDER against his neck, lowering him -- and his plat the floor. Right in front of the dog, who GROWLS --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now say you're sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (biting his tongue) I'm-- sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His name's 'Happy.' HappyBARES HIS TEETH. INCHES from Atticus' face

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry... 'Happy.'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright then. (lowers her rifle) You're right. That was fun.
-- Atticus scrambles back to his feet and OUT the door, a looks at the Man In Black:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What're you doing with my dog?

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: I was hoping you could tell me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hell're you talking ab--? WRIST BRACELET. Surprise and REVELATION:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where... did you get that? Before he can answer, SHERIFF TAGGART enters, along with WADE (carrying a SHOTGUN), and 5 other deputies. They mov cautiously to THE MAN, like he's a powder keg about to go

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey there, "Luke." Mind following me down to the office so we can have us a chat...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What for?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All due respect, I'm the law, mister. That's what for. The men LOCK EYES:

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: Tell you what, Sheriff. How about you keep the fifty dollars you owe me and I just walk outta here like we. never met?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because we did meet. ON ELLA. For reasons we're not sure of, the idea of The M leaving ALARMS her. All the Gunslingers' hands are POISED holsters. The Man stays preternaturally COOL:

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: L can't be accountable for what happens if they draw on me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what's gonna happen?

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: Best you don't find out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now why'd you have to go and say that? Taggart gives a nod and the men start to CONVERGE --

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK
dialogues.text: (low; genuine plea) Don't. But Charlie makes a MOVE and The Man SLAMS his head into -- the NEXT GUNMAN reaches for his pistol -- The Man PUNC THROAT -- SLAMS the third into a bench -- The FOURTH stra down on the Faro table -- TAGGART levels his REPEATER -- but The Man just GRABS the as Taggart FIRES a ROUND into the ceiling -- now the rifl THE MAN'S HANDS and just before he PULLS THE TRIGGER on T HE SEES EMMETT AT THE WINDOW. About to watch his father's MURDER... and The Man LOWERS the gun:

dialogues.speaker: THE MAN IN BLACK, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: I told you, I don't wanna hurt anyb-- CRACK! The butt of a PISTOL WHIPS the side of his SKULL! Man DROPS as we REVEAL who just knocked his ass OUT: ELLA! Taggart draws a gun and pins The Man, whipping out piece of paper he pulled from his office...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yup -- looks just like him.

dialogues.speaker: SHERIFF TAGGART, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: "Jake Lonergan. Scourge a' The Territories. Wanted Dead or Alive." And The Man... now forever known as JAKE... stares WOOZIL his OVERTURNED HAT... the photo tucked inside of the BEAU WOMAN... her image goes BLURRY... then mil{:

dialogues.speaker: MEMORY FLASHCUTS1 STROBELIXE IMAGES --
dialogues.text: 1.) A tilted, handmade trail sign: "SAGUARO PASS." 2.) We're in a CABIN somewhere. BLINDING ULTRAVIOLET LIGH EXPLODES INTO THE CABIN, against which a DEMONIC SILHOUET appears -- it looks like an INDIAN IN FULL-FEATHER HEADDR

looks at us and SCREAMS -- 4.) Now we're someplace VERY DARK -- a cave? As some kind TERRIFYING OCULAR PROBE lowers right in front of our eyes 5.) Now we're RUNNING through the cave -- ESCAPE -- BREAT HARD -- a LIGHT at the end of the tunnel -- BLINDING SUN as we emerge -- our eyes ADJUST to see: 6.) A STRANGE ROCK FORMATION on the rim of a canyon -- li STONE TOWER pointing to heaven as the SUN WHITEWASHES US

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE'S EYES OPEN and he GASPS AIR! His POV: a FACE comes FOCUS -- PERCY DOLARHYDE. GRINNING at him from the next c

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a dead. Jake sits up. Woozy. Blinking back to reality.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My daddy's comin' for me, Boy. You're gonna end up another dead shitheel under his spurs. I am gonna watch you suffer for a long, long -- Jake moves LIGHTNING QUICK -- reaching through the bars, GRABBING PERCY'S COLLAR, YANKING FORWARDS -- SLAMMING Per head into the bars, KNOCKING hIM OUT COLD AGAIN. Percy DR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up. Jake sits back on his cot, rubbing his still-throbbing he

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A PRISON WAGON pulls up in front of the Sheriff's office, with Taggart's GUNMEN on horseback. ELLA takes frame as t dismount and head into the office -- she pursues DEPUTY W with a real sense of PURPOSE:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need to see Lonergan. It's important.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 'Fraid not, Miss -- we're preppin' him for transport. And pushes PAST her, into the office with the men. HOLD o -- dammit, she NEEDS to find a way in there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A KEY in the LOCK as the cell door OPENS: Sheriff Taggart the gunmen. GLARING at Jake, then noticing Percy --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened to him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Man walked into a bar. Taggart shakes his head as Charlie and a deputy unlock Pe cell, CUFF HIM, drag him out. Taggart points to Jake:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Step back against the wall there. Move and I shoot you dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (as he does) You should've let me go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I should've shot you in your knee. You put down six of my deputies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Six was all you had.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hell, they're gonna love you in Phoenix.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah? What's in Phoenix?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What you got comin', Jake Lonergan. Taggart reaches into his shirt, pulls out a pair of GLASS Slips them on his nose. Takes out that WANTED poster and

dialogues.speaker: SHERIFF TAGGART, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Aggravated banditry, 17 counts, Forgery, Blackmail, Hijacking, injurious use of a cattle prod, Arson, Incitement of Whorehouse Riot, and Trespassing with intent to deflower. You're also leader of a gang of outlaws includin' Creek Johnson and Bull McCade, which makes you accessory to every law they broke too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (after a long BEAT:) That it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Saved the best for last... 'Murder.' That LANDS on Jake. Wondering if this is TRUE. Evenly --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It say who I killed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prostitute outta Mojave, name of Alice Wills. Taggart rises, removes Jake's BLACK STETSON from a hook o wall, pulls that PHOTOGRAPH OF THE WOMAN from the inner b

dialogues.speaker: SHERIFF TAGGART, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: If I were a bettin' man, I'd say this would be Ms. Wills, would it not? Jake just stares, CONFUSED. SHAKEN.

dialogues.speaker: SHERIFF TAGGART, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: They found her dead in a cabin round Saguaro Pass, twenty miles west of here. With that, a CLUE falls into place: SAGUARO PASS.

dialogues.speaker: SHERIFF TAGGART, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Deed was in your name. He slips the photo back in the brim, tosses the hat to Ja

dialogues.speaker: SHERIFF TAGGART, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Dead hooker with a hole in her chest, in your cabin, plus your sterling reputation equals guilty as goddamned sin. (draws his GUN) And you're gonna hang for it. At gunpoint, Taggart PUSHES Jake out the door --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Against the RISING SUN, Dolarhyde and 15 GUNMEN ride hard to the teems. They REAR in the hills above Absolution. Do looks down through BINOCULARS as NAT COLORADO turns to... an incoming WIND. Across the valley, a massive BLACK CLOU is starting to SWIRL. Violent BLUE FLASHES within. Eerie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: blue light... Clanton said he saw blue light before the cows disappeared...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just a storm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No storm I've ever seen... I say we wait 'til it passes. But Dolar isn't listening. THROUGH HIS BINOCULARS: he see PERCY being carried into the prison wagon. Followed by Ja

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No time, they put him in an iron coach. With a HYA! he's OFF, the others FOLLOWING with reluctant -- still SPOOKED by that incoming STORM:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Jake's loaded into the prison wagon after the still- unconscious Percy, he SEES MEACHAM through the barred win The preacher flashes SYMPATHY as Wade takes out the cuff

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gimme your wrist. Jake holds out his hands. Wade unlocks one wrist, freeing cuff... then takes that cuff and LOCKS IT to Percy's wris

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What're you --?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Best way to make a man stay put: chain him to his enemy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You lovebirds have a nice trip now. SLAM: the door CLOSES and LOCKS. Jake SIGHS and tries to back, but it's hard tethered to Percy's slumped form. Shi Then QWW -- something starts to STING and he looks down: HIS BRACELET. Has started PULSING RED. And it's getting W Jake stares -- ON EDGE -- what the hell's happening? As - OUTSIDE, Taggart mounts the buckboard. EMMETT feeds the h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sure he's a bad guy, Pa? He did give Percy a lickin'.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's bad enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (not so sure, but --) . can I come with you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Too dangerous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dangerous to drive a damn coach? Why can't Charlie just take him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because it's my job, Emmett. That's what these people pay me to do. And your mother would kill me if I brought you. Emmett looks off, half sad, half angry --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good thing she's already dead then. And turns without a goodbye. Taggart watches him leave, w he could connect. Takes the reins and looks up -- REACTS: THAT MASSIVE. FRIGHTENING CLOUD IN THE SKY -- roiling fas toward town. The scary BLUE FLASHES within grow more INTE IN THE COACH -- WITH JAKE, looking at the BRACELET, the p growing MORE FREQUENT -- and then, a VOICE:

dialogues.speaker: HEY
dialogues.text: Jake turns to see ELLA, pushed up against the coach windo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me where you got that bracelet...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe you should'a asked before you knocked me out..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please... I need to know. Just tell me where you got it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Y dOli' .xBmbgX - - I don' t remember my name or where I've been or any of the things they said I done, so leave me the hell alone. And sits back as the coach starts to MOVE, leaving Ella i dust. Some of the gunmen ride atop it; others on horsebac cover the coach in a protective ring. Wade sees something incoming from the NORTH:

dialogues.speaker: KYLE
dialogues.text: Taggart looks up: Dolarhyde's gang racing down the mounta

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He unslings his SHOTGUN as his men ready their weapons -- ON DOLARHYDE'S GANG, riding hard, guns ready too -- This is about to get UGLY. BUT... from the OTHER end of t the WIND picks up -- As the massive storm cloud seems shockingly to have STORE H -- its EYE churning, ROARING and... TWO BOLTS OF BLUE LIGHTNING CRACK DOWN FROM IT! Happy starts BARKING MADLY. sees the lightning and starts to BACK AWAY in fear:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NonoNO -- GET TO YOUR CELLARS! EVERYONE

dialogues.speaker: UNDERGROUND NAT
dialogues.text: But her cries are LOST as -- RRRRRRRR!!!!!

dialogues.speaker: BREAKING THE MOMENTUM OF THE SHOWDOWN --
dialogues.text: The stagecoach UPENDS, FLIPPING SIDEWAYS as the animals t break free -- Taggart and his men are THROWN -- Inside, Jake and Percy TUMBLE end-over-end -- SLAMMING in walls, LOCKED TOGETHER -- JARRING Percy back to conscious Dolarhyde's men are THROWN from their horses too as the a STAMPEDE OFF in different directions -- THE 1Q8k=O ENGULFS THE TOWN! THE CONCUSSIVE BLAST BUCKLES

dialogues.speaker: STRIPPED RIGHT OFF THEIR FALSE FRONTS LIKE PIANO KEYS
dialogues.text: Okay, wait. Just wait. Take a breath. 'Cause it's about ... . to get... . MORE insane...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jesus God!! STRANGE STEEL RINGS fire from the speeders and mushroom o KA-CHING! -- SNAP OPEN and CLAMP around necks, arms, legs from these steel collars, CABLES LASH OUT, whip-snapping the speeders and TETHERING MAGNETICALLY to them --
Yeah-these are HIGH-TECH LASSOS:

dialogues.speaker: HELPLESS VICTIMS ARE YANKED OFF THE GROUND AND PULLED BEH
dialogues.text: SPEEDERS LIKE ROPED STEER! Two of TAGGART'S GUNMEN. Now s of DOLARYHYDE' S. Screaming, just gone. THIS IS A...Qlp l EMMETT -- stunned -- as SHERIFF TAGGART runs for him --

dialogues.speaker: EMMETT
dialogues.text: Emmett runs into his dad's embrace --

dialogues.speaker: EMMETT SHERIFF TAGGART
dialogues.text: What's happening?! -- Stay _by-mvside! A_LIVERY_STABLE -- the HORSES stamp in their stalls as Ta tears the door open and rushes Emmett inside; as he's abo follow... am c1:t lU 01 If

dialogues.text: -- a STEEL CABLE fires from the collar, SNAPS TAUT as it connects to a speeder and WHOOSH! Taggart's RIPPED off hi feet, dragged away -- ELLA tackles the boy as ANOTHER RIN overhead, locks around a FLEEING WOMAN -- she's TAKEN --

dialogues.speaker: BIRDCAGE THEATER
dialogues.text: With a "C'MON!!!" she rushes him through the FRENZIED CRO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE AND !MERCY -- TRAPPED IN THE UPSIDE-DOWN COACH -- Ja DEPUTY WADE on the ground just a few feet away, head blee
-- but WHOOSH! A METAL COLLAR CLAMPS AROUND WADE AND YANK AWAY! Percy STRUGGLES wildly against Jake in a TUG-O'-WAR

dialogues.speaker: YOUR DAMN HAND
dialogues.text: Percy RELENTS. Offers up his hand. Jake grabs all of Perc

dialogues.speaker: FINGERS, TIGHTENS HIS FIST AROUND THEM
dialogues.text: SNAPS THEM BACKWARDS!!!!! Percy SHRIEKS as Jake KICKS him against the wall, FORCING Percy's hand out of the cuff -- now Jake's UNTETHERED too! THROUGH THE CROWD -- DOLARHYDE hears his son SCREAM. SEES overturned coach and TWO-FINGER WHISTLES to:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Colorado! Nat Colorado RACES IN as Dolar draws his .45 -- BANG! -- shatters the coach lock -- they PULL Percy out:

dialogues.speaker: QUIT WHININ' AND FIND A HORSE
dialogues.text: As Dolar runs for his horse, Percy sees a PISTOL left on ground -- grabs it with his good hand and FIRES at Jake w JUKES behind the coach for cover, Percy SHOOTING in a FUR -- KLINK! A collar CLAMPS around Percy's neck and he's YA OFF TOO! Dolarhyde turns and SEES HIS SON DISAPPEAR:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meacham ushers people into the church as WALLS SHAKE, PEW

dialogues.text: DOC AND MARIA burst in, huddle under a window. Across the a YOUNG MAN clamps a hand over his TERRIFIED WIFE's mouth

dialogues.speaker: AYUDAMEEEEEEE
dialogues.text: Doc LEAPS after her but her collar's LASSO CABLE whips ou TETHERING to a passing Speeder and she's RIPPED OUT THE D

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ELLA -- hurrying Emmett toward the theater's CELLAR DOOR, SPEEDER circles around and ROARS toward them -- ON JAKE. He SEES this -- and suddenly, to HIS surprise as as OURS... HIS BRACELET ACTIVATES! METAL COMING TO LIFE, coiling up around his arm -- WHAT? HOW? -- as it becomes.

dialogues.speaker: A SMART GUN BLASTER WE PON
dialogues.text: tracking that speeder as it DESCENDS on Ella and the moth
