dialogues.speaker: KYLE
dialogues.text: ANOTHER METAL TENTACLE slithers in and GRABS WADE -- swin our men across the cavern where we reveal... . the tentacles are attached to a TERRIFYING ALIEN MACHIN Taggart and Wade are PINNED DOWN on what looks like an op table. As they thrash, RESTRAINING CLAMPS enfold their sk An OCULAR PROBE looms _Q.Xpr. them, This is the image _ e seeing! This is what haRpened to him before he escaRe ! WORKER-BEE ALIENS adjusts the device over their eyes -- I X-RAYS read their retinas -- HYPNOTIC -- as the men grow and LIMP despite their fight and -- FLASHFLASHTLASHI The probe has ERASED THEIR MINDS. Catatonic stares. Now the machine arms slip the men into separate TRANSLUCE CAPSULES. METAL BREATHING TUBES are implanted down their throats as the capsules begin to fill with a THICK, BLUE This is the same blue goo -- a protective gel -- that hou COW in that jettisoned cocoon in the desert. More Worker Bees load the cocoons into TRANSPORT SHUTTLEC We see containment holds filled with BLEATING COWS and RE HORSES... all going through a similar cocooning process. All of this is overseen by THE SLAVER, who stalks up a ra behind the cocoons. The craft HUMS to life, undergear retracting as it ROARS OFF down the tunnel...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our people ride up a rocky slope with a few Apaches. Grey looks around and SPEAKS, Colorado translates:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Kiowa land, their sister tribe. As they near the bluff, Jake sees the STONE TOWER. Dismou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's it. As they near the bluff, they hear the growing sound of th MACHINERY. Everyone dips low, peering over to see...

What looks a whole lot like a CAVALRY FORT in the canyon amid a network of trenches and underground tunnels. Excep fortress is made of some kind of ALIEN ALLOY, glowing imp bright as its steel surface reflects the rising sun. DRILLING MACHINES are chewing deep into the earth, mining

dialogues.speaker: GOLD
dialogues.text: Massive receptacles are FILLED with HUGE CHUNKS. ALIENS move in and out, working, as if from an ant hive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Holy Jesus. Like a damn fort. Grey Wolf looks to his men, GRAVE, CRESTFALLEN as he real

dialogues.speaker: GREY WOLF, (SUBTITLE)
dialogues.text: The Kiowa... they were taken too. Suddenly, the ROOF of the steel structure blossoms open l CHROME LOTUS... and WHOOSH! The SHUTTLE TRANSPORT flies o the canyon, RISING into the dawn sky...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Transports. Way they get people and gold back and forth to the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Place is crawling with those things. We'll never even get close. Grey Wolf SPEAKS --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He says there's a back way in... The Twin Rivers run underneath this whole canyon. Limestone tunnels up by the falls, couple miles East. Lead right down there. Jake looks to the SKY. DARK. DETERMINED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Slaver... he's up in that big cloud? Ella nods, HARD. Off their SHARED DETERMINATION, our SCOR rises. A DRUM CADENCE that suggests a MISSION starting to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOC. Skeptical, eyes narrow -- staring at Jake and Ella - surrounded by our team and the Apaches back at the APACHE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just so I got this straight... three of those things just kicked the shit out of your entire gang, took our whole town, and now you two're gonna ride right into that fort, try to hijack one'a those-- He pauses on the word --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Transports."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- ride it up to that space boat --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Spaceshp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then bring it down here and get everybody off alive? That's your big plan? Jake and Ella share a LOOK. Simply:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And just how do you figure on getting in there in the first place?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Poke a hornet's nest... they swarm at'cha.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You gotta draw 'em out. Buy us a distraction. A long beat of incredulous, do-you-believe-this-shit STAR

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want us to storm that fort? Against those things? With less than fifty men? It's suicide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It ain't, it's been done! I read at school how Ethan Allen and his Green Mountain Boys took Fort Ticonderoga, they weren't but a small garrison and they were outgunned --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need all of you to make a stand. Together. It's the only way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Make a stand with what? Jake turns to the WAGON they rode from Jake's gang camp - WHISKEY CRATES. Sweeps up a bottle:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This. An impossible mission. Sure death. Yet for the first time they have an ADVANTAGE. Emmett cuts the moment with a BIG

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hell, yeah. Let's squish some bugs. Grey Wolf CHUCKLES, murmurs. Jake looks to Nat for transl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Somethin' funny?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah... that you whites finally know what it feels like to face extinction. Now that we're on the same side, he says we can all die together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're with us. The LOOK holds between them --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guess that means you're not waitin' for your dad to come back. Colorado's face CLOUDS. Years of ANGER and RESENTMENT:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Been Woodrow Dolarhyde's son my whole life... first time he ever copped to it was to save his own ass. (not without emotion) He's not comin' back. And as Colorado TURNS away, the PERCUSSION finds another

dialogues.speaker: OUR CLAN PREPARES FOR BATTLE
dialogues.text: Pieces of CLOTH are RIPPED, stuffed inside the WHISKEY BO MOLOTOV COCKTAILS... Emmett works with Apaches and their KIDS, roping WOOD tog to build LADDERS and CATAPULTS... WAR PAINT is applied to faces in DARK STREAKS...
Jake slips on his coat. Sees Emmett lead a horse to mount with his BOW and ARROW QUIVER:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not you, Kid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aw, hell, we been through this. Ya can't stop me. Jake draws his gun, SPINS it in his palm, aims at Emmett'

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can shoot you in the foot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bu111i11SHIT. Jake SIGHS -- bluff called. Holsters the gun and takes a knee... but just when we think this is gonna be a tender he GRABS Emmett by the collar, pulls him CLOSE:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You told me your daddy's all you got left. Want me to save his ass? Then park yours right there on the ground, you little shit. Got me? Emmett's nailed. ANGRY, but knows he's gotta stay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. I gotcha. Jake releases him. Happy moves to Ella but she TSKS:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay with the kid, Happy. The dog WHINES but complies, moving next to Emmett. Jake on his horse. Looks back to the boy -- now he Ia tender:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll get your father back. Bastard still owes me fifty dollars. The hint of a SMIRK... long enough for Emmett to SMIRK BA Ella, Doc, and Colorado mount Г‚В»p too, along with a 10- WAR PARTY. Jake meets eyes with GREY WOLF:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll be ready? Grey Wolf NODS. Some part of the PLAN we have yet to lear And now Jake starts to trot off, Ella beside him. This pl just between the two of them:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's a nice thing... what you said to the boy. I didn't know better, I'd say you got yourself a sweet side. She smiles. But Jake turns to her -- deadly serious:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's nothin' sweet about me. I told that kid what he needed to hear so he wouldn't get in my damn way. All I care about is killin' that thing. And Ella reacts to the DARKNESS in his voice. Shakes her

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't believe that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well believe it. I was playing a part. (straight at her) Just like you were. He CRACKS the reins, riding ahead. HOLD ON ELLA... who fi follows as they all ride out and MUSIC SOARS:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THUNDERING HOOVES -- but it's DOLARHYDE on his horse. REA near the SERVANTS QUARTERS -- moving FAST toward a small A HATCHET is embedded in a wood pile. Dolarhyde YANKS it

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The APACHE WOMAN we saw in the drawn-and-quartered scene is washing clothes on a basin board. She turns as -- Dolarhyde ENTERS. A menacing figure with a blade in the doorway. She stands, ALERT -- in SUBTITLED APACHE:

dialogues.speaker: THE WOMAN, (SUBTITLE)
dialogues.text: What are you doing? Without response, he levels the axe and SLAMS it down on FLOORBOARDS. Wood chips SPRAY until a GASH is opened. Dol REACHES in... pulling out a CANVAS BAG. A few COINS spill out... COLD. He picks them up -- looks at the woman:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Need it to save Nat.
And now her worry becomes FEAR; English now:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is he okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's gonna be. A storm of mixed emotions in his eyes. That stoic Dolarhy veneer starts to CRACK... just a hint... as the woman MOV him... and TOUCHES his face. And he lets her. WHOA. We realize: this woman is COLORADO MOTHER. Dolarhyde, for all his wicked bluster, LOVES AN A

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I won't let anything happen to him, Jenny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come back to me. With that, he's GONE with the gold. Leaving her full of D

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CASCADING WATERFALL flows over rock face into the TWIN The water curtain covers a CAVERN ENTRANCE. The back way Jake, Ella, Doc, Colorado and the Apaches cross slippery and push through the water...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind the curtain, they shake off the wet and remove TOR from waterproof buffalo-hide pouches. FIRELIGHT as our te creeps along in a column. TENSE. Jake glances at Colorado

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You and Percy're brothers, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... half.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So... your momma and Dolarhyde---

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We friends now? Last I checked, you shot my ear off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a beat; then) Want it back?
Colorado GRUMBLES, pushes ahead of Jake...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BUZZARD picks at the EAR of a DEAD GANG MEMBER. More bi scavenge the dismembered remains of JAKE'S CREW as the re its LIVING MEMBERS -- roughly 30 -- tend wounds and get r move on. One of them looks up... .. and sees an INCOMING RIDER on the horizon:

dialogues.speaker: BRONC
dialogues.text: BRONC and HUNT look up. Draws their GUNS. So does the res the gang... until they see the rider's waving a WHITE FLA he comes closer -- they realize it's DOLARHYDE:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of them fellas Jake was ridin' with! Dolarhyde rides into camp, REARING in front of 30 guns

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hell you want?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's about what you want. He reaches into his pocket and tosses Bronc a GOLD COIN:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lonergan stole your gold. That's a taste of what I got -- more'n you've ever seen. It's all yours if you help me get my boy back. The men trade LOOKS. Bronc eyes the coin. Alight with gre

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's got your boy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, there's the rub.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got two. Off that --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our team has travelled far into the bowels of the cavern. STOPS, torchlight reflecting the GOLD in the cavern walls Doc cracks off a piece. POCKETS it. Shrugs:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In case we live through this. They SNEAK on down the narrow shaft til they're funneled

dialogues.speaker: THE WATER GROTTO
dialogues.text: Where our TOWNSPEOPLE were hanging. Now, GONE. Around the corner, the sound of ENGINES POWERING UP... A TRANSPORT. A dozen WORKER-BEE ALIENS try to corral the from the pen -- cruelly jabbing the animals with ALIEN CA PRODS. The mares REAR and WHINNY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're never gonna get close to that ship. Silently. a DRIPPING. GLISTENING SHAPE rises un from the behind them. Swaying like a COBRA ready to strike: Our people TURN... the TUBE ALIEN snatches one of the Apa SWALLOWING HIM in its thorny snout! The indian SCREAMS --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lights a WHISKEY MOLOTOV, hurls it at the CREATURE: BOOM! KEENS, BURNING, SPITTING OUT the Apache. ALERTED, the doz aliens by the transport SWARM at our heroes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C g_that shuttle. Colorado readies his TOMAHAWK -- Jake meets his eyes:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Knew there was a good reason I didn't kill you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just thinkin' the same thing. The men trade FATEFUL LOOKS... then the Indians HURL MOLO the charging horde: KAAA-BOOM! Aliens TWIST and SCREAM -- The Apaches STRIKE FEARLESSLY -- but the aliens quickly R and SHAKE THEM OFF, tearing most of them to SHREDS. The horses BREAK FREE and crash madly through the cavern And this is the DISTRACTION Jake and Ella need to make th for the transport -- up the loading ramp:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ella SLAMS a switch and the ramp DRAWS UP. Jake FREEZES: COCOONS hang all around, filled with motionless HUMAN BEI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jake - - (he can only stare) JAKE. She slaps open an ENGINEERING HATCH, drops down a LADDER. takes a last awful look and SLIDES down after her --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- the ladder funnels into the COCKPIT. Ella starts TAPPI console and HOLO-DISPLAYS appear, Alien text, rotating graphics. She slides into a SEAT --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Strap in. dammit!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Into what?!? Ella JAMS a lever forward and the shuttle RISES. JAKE gra WEBBING that must be some type of SEATBELT, feeling the sensation of ELLQU as:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ella pilots the ship UPWARD, thrusters belching a WAKE OF that SCORCHES cavern walls and INCINERATES 6 ALIENS! As a HORSE streaks by, Colorado grabs a hunk of mane, LEA

dialogues.speaker: LET'S GO
dialogues.text: DOC comes RUNNING frantically:

dialogues.speaker: DON'T LEAVE ME
dialogues.text: Colorado PULLS Doc up onto the horse's bare back -- no ea with Doc's 300 POUNDS. The remaining Apaches (5) commande horses and GALLOP HARD down the tunnel -- Two aliens jump on MANTA-SPEEDERS in pursuit!

dialogues.speaker: THE TRANSPORT SHUTTLE KAMIKAZES THROUGH BI-SECTING TUNNEL
dialogues.text: Jake has NEVER moved this fast, BARELY avoiding walls as expertly pilots the ship. LEFT -- RIGHT -- SIDEWAYS -- up ahead, DIM LIGHT spills from a FISSURE leading above grou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on.
She cranks back and the ship PITCHES upward --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The shuttle BURSTS OUT into the canyon and skates the rim fights the G-FORCES and teeth-rattling TURBULENCE as -- The craft keeps spiralling UP UP toward... THE OMINOUS CL As we come closer, an IMPOSSIBLY BLUE GLOW blinds us:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The shuttle BLASTS through the upper cloud layer, to reve

dialogues.speaker: THE ALIEN SCOUT
dialogues.text: -SHIP. ENORMOUS AND THREATENING, like a BLACK METAL CLAW. of a hurricane. ON ELLA. Like ice down her spine... as we drift back to J Trying to find a word to DESCRIBE this thing. Finally:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sheee-it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rest of our heroes GALLOP FAST out the criss-crossing tunnels -- KA-CHINNNG! Apaches are CLAMPED WITH STEEL COL and YANKED off their horses as the SPEEDERS roar in from Colorado VEERS toward a LIGHT as Doc ignites a molotov an

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: GALLOP Out into daylight, rigb-t_through the CENTER of th Doc THROWS his molotov and BOOM!!! Aliens go FLYING, on f Doc throws another MOLOTOV, clearing a path for Colorado HARD for the fort's 30 FT. STEEL ENTRY GATES... which sta SWINGING CLOSED to trap them! But at the LAST SECOND, the horse SLIPS THROUGH the narro opening as it THUNDERS CLOSED. Now the aliens are pissed

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They start spilling over the fort walls in pursuit. A few SPEEDERS and launch as our guys ride DOWN THE CANYON TREN

dialogues.speaker: ,INT. CANYON TRENCH
dialogues.text: Colorado and Doc ZIG-ZAG around CURVES -- like mice navig maze, so the speeders can't get a clear shot:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're gaining on us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the point! And just when it looks like Doc and Colorado are GONERS.. BOOM! An EXPLOSION rocks the canyon as something HURTLES from above -- WHISKEY MOLOTOVS fired from the handmade CATAPULTS. BOOM! BOOM! Aliens are VAPORIZED, SHRIEKING! A cloudburst of FLAMING ARROWS brightens the sky as 20 AP RISE UP along the canyon rims: A AMBUSH! An ASSEMBLY LINE OF SQUAWS works like a drill team, soaki WHISKEY RAGS and wrapping arrows. Among them, EMMETT and The kid pocks an arrow like a damn EXPERT -- IGNITES it - it FLY -- WHOOSH! It SKEWERS a speeder pilot who BURSTS I FLAMES, the speeder CORKSCREWS into another one, both EXP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Caught OFF-GUARD with NO WM TO TURN AROUND as from the OP END of the canyon, a BELLOWING WAR WHOOP:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CRASH! The Apaches HURTLE into the flank of aliens. LASER met with the CRACK of RIFLES and hatchets --

dialogues.speaker: TAKE THE FORT
dialogues.text: The Apache leader spurs his horse onward, leading men tow alien bunker. An EXPLOSION CONSUMES FRAME, becoming the:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- PLASMA FIRE of the shuttle's burners as it ROARS towar ALIEN SHIP... a SPECK against the BEHEMOTH:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The shuttle sweeps past the command center's polarized wi where... THE SLAVER watches with EVIL EYES. He's on the UPPER LEVEL of a TWO-TIER COMMAND CENTER. A D ALIENS operate holo-consoles. Readying the ship to leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ella settles down on a GLOWING DOCKING COLLAR. With the t ships CONNECTED, the DISPLAY flashes a DEPARTURE ALERT:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Dammit --- -- what--?

dialogues.speaker: -- WHAT'S WRQNG
dialogues.text: -- she's CLIMBING back up the ladder, he FOLLOWS:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They quickly CLIMB up the LADDER TUBE --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Engines are warming up -- got eight minutes til the ship leaves, and about one til automated retrieval --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- autojamated what --?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they spill into the LOADING BAY, a CLANG reverberates: THE AIRLOCK DOOR -- AT THEIRFEyT The first EXPLOSIVE BOLT shoots off. Ella jams her SHOTGU a sheath on her back, presses herself flat:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hug the wall. Jake does that beside her as the next bolt PINGS out --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When they come at us, aim for their heads. Only way to kill 'em for sure. He looks at his bracelet, adrenaline SURGING -- it ACTIVA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll aim just fine. THE LAST BOLT FIRES and the airlock door SHOOTS OFF:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SonofaBITCH! The manipulator arms SCOOP UP COCOONS, pulling them DOWN

dialogues.speaker: C'MON
dialogues.text: She JUMPS through the airlock -- Jake has no time to thin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And JUMPS after her --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- LANDING beside Ella. Starts to pick himself up... but he sees ASSAULTS HIS MIND. We RISE UP UP UP, Ella and Jak growing SMALLER in what we now reveal is a MASSIVE HANGAR

dialogues.speaker: AUTOMATED -ARMS PLANT RECENT ARRIVALS INTO A VERITABLE FO
dialogues.text: PEOPLE AND ANIMALS. Level after level, THOUSANDS UPON THO OF COCOONS are suspended from branch-like limbs. Jake picks himself up, looking around the massive hangar

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ГЏВїВЅCIDYAPLQLWJJ

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- she PULLS HIM into an alcove as a machine arm SWINGS overhead, flashing a WIDE CONICAL LASER that inventories like the machine in the underground cave. As they CROUCH: ELLA (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't let that thing see us or they'll know we're here. She turns -- hits buttons on a console -- a door SLIDES U leading to a series of CORRIDORS. She starts to MOVE -- ELLA (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This'll take us to the bridge -- But Jake doesn't follow. STARES at her -- JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slaver's up there--? ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I sure as hell hope not. JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then I'm not goin' with you. And now she HARDENS -- ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You got any idea how big this ship is? No ray you'll ever find him alone. Be like findin' a needle in a-- -- SLAM!! Jake interrupts her by aiming at the LASER SCAN and FIRING HIS BLASTER, blowing it apart. The scanner eye CRASHES to the floor, flaming. A KLAXON rings --
JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I ain't gonna find him. He's gonna find me. ELLA'S FURIOUS: ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks for the head start. She turns and RUNS. Jake moves to that scanner eye on the floor, walks right up to it and STARES into the shattered JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, you sonofabitch... come and get me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: JAKE'S FACE APPEARS AS A THERMAL HEAT SOURCE -- fritzing stares into the scanner. ALARMS scream. THE SLAVER fills with RAGE. And RECOGNITION. Aliens begin grabbing WEAPONS but The Slaver SHRIEKS for STOP. We don't need to speak alien to understand: "He's mine. "

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jake has moved out into the corridors -- blaster ready -- darting -- suddenly -- WHAM: A STEEL BARRICADE SLAMS DOWN BEHIND HIM. WHAM! Another in front -- WHAM! He's TRAPPED, shut off from the passageway .. except ONE. A long, dark tunnel. A DOOR at the far end HISSES open: THE TURBOLIFT ELEVATOR. ON JAKE. Understanding... his call is bging answe JAKE (QUIETLY; HARD)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. And starts walking to the elevator... as a SCREAM takes u

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Handmade LADDERS are SWUNG FORWARD onto the fort as Apach to SCALE the wall, but are BLOWN BACK by ALIEN PARAPET SE ON DOC -- running TRIAGE on wounded warriors:
DOC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need more bandages now!/ You: lint and splint that leg!

dialogues.speaker: GREY WOLF, (SUBTITLE)
dialogues.text: We're losing ranks ! ! ! And then, out of nowhere... the BANG BANG BANG of 30 pist fills the air as -- DOLARHYDE RIDES IN WITH JAKE'S GANG! A renewed SURGE of e as cowboys join Indians to fortify their ranks: NAT COLORADO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You came back! DOLARHYDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Told you: I take care of my kin. Colorado knows that's as close to "I love you" as he'll e get. But the UPSWING is short-lived as: A speeder WHIZZES past, dropping a METALLIC BUNDLE. It sp open right in front of the fort's STEEL GATES -- pieces hydraulically ASSEMBLING THEMSELVES in seconds, becoming: THE MOTHERFUCKING SUPERGUN_OF DEATH. TWO LETHAL BARRELS s life, firing STRANGE STEEL BALL BEARINGS in every directi CLAW HOOKS snap out of the balls, EMBEDDING in soldiers! LODGES in a GANG MEMBER beside DOC -- he FLAILS: GANG MEMBER

dialogues.speaker: HELP ME
dialogues.text: A RED SPRING-LOADED PIN depresses in the ball's center: K

dialogues.speaker: SEARING WHITE LIGHT TURNS THE OFFICER TOAASH
dialogues.text: GRENADE! Doc goes FLYING from the kickback, landing near: GREY WOLF -- FWWWWTWHCK!!! Another claw-ball CLAMPS into Apache's SHOULDER -- he SHOUTS, struggles to pull it out DOC

dialogues.speaker: DON'T. STOP, DAMMIT
dialogues.text: The RED PIN starts to depress -- pOC LUNGES, JAMS HIS FIN RETJff&H_THE PIN AND BLASTING CAP. Now he's stopped i exploding, but if he pulls his finger out... HE DIES TOO. DOC and GREY WOLF lock eyes. Their fates suddenly ENTWINE

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUOUS
dialogues.text: Bars of light move rhythmically across Jake's face -- BUR with determination -- as he travels up in the turbolift. slows to a STOP. The door cycles open and --
-- the STRANGEST THING happens. DESERT SAND billows in a of ventilated air. SAND?! Jake emerges, blocking his eyes

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- the sand swirls and eddies. Visibility reduced to ZERO Jake pushes through, the air clears a little... His eyes WIDEN. Trying to make SENSE of what he sees: Remember all those BUILDINGS that were pulled up into the tornado when Absolution was attacked? And that CRATER the found that used to be "Winfield's Landing"? It-'-s all-HE in a junkwle hangar. Building pieces. False front facades. Debris piled on top of each other, TILTED AND TW AT FUNHOUSE ANGLES. And the desert sand that was sucked u along with it all. A GLOWING REACTOR casts hellish light on the dormant wrec Weapon ready, Jake moves past part of A BROTHEL. Jutting fragments of a HORSE CORRAL. A CREAKING SALOON SIGN swing a pendulum, CLANKS EERILY. A STEAM PIPE EXPLODES STEAM. Jake WHIRLS -- and like demo 5 ALIENS emerge. Slowly. Fanning out, taking positions as THE SLAVER steps out of the smoke, squarely facing Jake. is holding ELLA hostage. WRIST BLASTER pressed to her thr Jake and Ella LOCK EYES. She's terrified, but staying STR His hand LINGERS at his hip, blaster ready. JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drop the woman. We both know this ain't about her. But The Slaver only presses his blaster HARDER into Ella' Almost GRINNING. And Jake MEETS the look -- JAKE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She says you're as bad as they come. Jake curls back the fingers on both hands, CRACKING knuck JAKE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, you ugly sonofabitch... they say the same about me. A pipe SPEWS STEAM -- UNNERVINGLY LOUD. Then STOPS. JAKE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could'a had your boys kill me five times over, instead you rolled out the red carpet... so let's get it over with.

The Slaver HISSES ANGRILY at the challenge. PUSHES Ella r off to one of his GANG, who keeps a blaster pressed to he Vow ' O right the a ter of the "town" junkpile. THE SLAVER -- his hand at his side, twitching. JAKE -- his hand is still.

dialogues.speaker: A PIPE SPRAYS STEAM AGAIN, SCREAMINGLY LOUD AND --
dialogues.text: Everyone DRAWS! But Jake's INSANELY FAST as he drops to a and FIRES gunsmoke-style -- BLAM SLAM! The Slaver's HIT a ELLA -- WRENCHES her captor's arm backward and he fires U ROUNDS into the air -- she takes a HIT in the leg as Jake the captor with a SHOT to the temple -- Jake GRABS and PULLS Ella to safety behind a SHREDDED STO FRONT, taking cover -- lasers PUNCHING through the buildi walls -- Ella spots an ALIEN lunging around a corner: ELLA

dialogues.speaker: BEHIND YOU
dialogues.text: Jake WHIRLS, SLAM!!! The creature FLIES off its feet. JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay down. Ella does, and here come the rest of the aliens as Jake G THEM ALL DOWN WITH PERFECT AIM. The REACTOR is hit in the crossfire and the ship RESPONDS turbine HOWL. Corpses litter the floor... all except for The Slaver. A of FLUORESCENT BLOOD leads around the corner... Jake WHIRLS to Ella -- her leg wounded -- JAKE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- you alright? In PAIN, she snatches one of those SMART DISCS off a dead ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Reactor's hit. if I don't get this ship on the ground soon, we're all dead... (tries to STAND, WINCES) Get me over to that turbolift. He slings an arm around her shoulder and LIFTS her, helpi to the elevator --
ELLA (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put me inside. He does. She sees his eyes go back to The Slaver's BLOOD ELLA (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can manage the rest without you. (tough... but with COMPASSION)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go do what you came up here to do. He looks at her. At the blood. At the unstable REACTOR. And Jake Lonergan makes a CHOICE: JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goddamnit. -- he gets INTO THE ELEVATOR with her. She SLAMS the cont pad, doors CLOSE -- they start rocketing upward. She half as her eyes hold on him. And within them... trust. AND FA JAKE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop smiling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the FORT SIEGE continues, DOLARHYDE and COLORADO gallo and forth between their men: DOLARHYDE

dialogues.speaker: GODDAMIT
dialogues.text: -- KATHWAM! An EXPLOSION throws them off their horses. Colorado picks up his father and they start RUNNING LOW u stray beams of PLASMA FIRE, reaching Doc and Grey Wolf:

dialogues.speaker: THE FOUR MEN
dialogues.text: Doc's finger is still STUCK in that ALIEN GRENADE, clampe the bleeding Apache's shoulder:

dialogues.speaker: DOL.ARHYDE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The hell iz that? Grey Wolf MOANS in pain. Doc SHOUTS to Dolar: DOC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell him to hold still! If I have this thing figured right, long as t keep my finger under the red pin we won't blow up!

dialogues.speaker: GREY WOLF, (SUBTITLE)
dialogues.text: What's he saying?:
DOLARHYDE (SUBTITLE)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He says we're all gonna die. COLORADO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to pull it out of his shoulder! DOLARHYDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not pullin' anything! (RE: DOC)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's the damn doctor! ZZZZZZAM! MORE people are CUT DOWN by the Alien GRENADE C -- the BLOWBACK nearly KNOCKS the grenade out of Doe's ha DOC

dialogues.speaker: SHIT
dialogues.text: Dolarhyde gets an IDEA. HARDENS. Looks Doc right in the e DOLARHYDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, listen -- you slide your finger from under that pin, I'll slip mine in and hold it in place. Then you pull it out and I'll throw it. Doc NODS fearfully. Dolar carefully SLIPS his finger unde pin as Doc SLIPS it out. PHEW. Now Doc takes hold of the grenade itself, nods "ready" to pull it out. Grey Wolf br FOR PAIN: DOC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On three... (DOLAR NODS)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One... t -- DOLARHYDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Wait. Everyone LURCHES from the tension interrupt: DOLARHYDE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell your wife we're clear. DOC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? DOLARHYDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- your wife. Maria. We had an arrangement. I left your saloon alone and she paid me off. ON DOC. Reeling, now REALLY confused -- DOC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're broke. Paid you off with what?
DOLARHYDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She stole from the people in your morgue. Gold teeth, trinkets, pocket watches -- It LANDS on Doc: that's why he fond the watch under their DOC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I thought she was cheating! DOLARHYDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just robbin' corpses. DOC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank God! (and then -- ) Wait. You hate me. Why're you telling me this? With GENUINE REMORSE: DOLARHYDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: May not get another chance -- (THEN)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- and I still hate ya. A MOMENT. Forgiveness and atonement.

dialogues.speaker: DOC AND DOLARHYDE
dialogues.text: One... two... three! And Doc RIPS the grenade from Grey Wolf's shoulder -- he CLAMPS tearing out of his flesh. But they did it! As more EXPLOSIONS decimate men, Dolarhyde PULLS the gren of Doc's hands, still holding his finger under the FIRING DOC WHAT'RE YOU--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dolarhyde looks at Colorado: DOLARHYDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell your mother I love her. With that, he CHARGES into the swirling chaos NAT COLORADO

dialogues.speaker: WAIT
dialogues.text: -- but BOOM! Colorado's FORCED BACK by an explosion -- th the debris, he sees his father running toward... THE SUPERCANNON
Dolarhyde HURLS the grenade -- BOOM!!! IT DETONATES IN A

dialogues.speaker: MILLION PIECES
dialogues.text: COLORADO

dialogues.speaker: NO
dialogues.text: But his sacrifice 7M S THE TIDE! THE EXPLOSION BLOWS THE

dialogues.speaker: FORT'S FRONT GATES OFF
dialogues.text: A CRY OF VICTORY as the humans STORM THROUGH! Aliens hurt back in DISORDER --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The small ALIEN BRIDGE CREW scrambles to control the dama ship. The WHIR of the lift arriving, doors OPEN and -- WHOOSH! The SMART WEAPON blurs out of the elevator, SLICI HALF A DOZEN ALIENS IN HALF -- circles back around to ELL skillfully catches it as she RUN/LIMPS from the lift with LASER FIRE IGNITES THE BRIDGE as he makes QUICK WORK of t and Ella mans a console, getting to work -- ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're going down fast. She calls up telemetry on a HOLO-WINDOW: EARTH TERRAIN -- BATTLEFIELD. Sets coordinates, vectoring the ship that wa A WHIR as a SECOND TURBOLIFT arrives... AND THE SLAVER ST QQT. Wounded, and very PISSED OFF. Jake says to Ella: JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No matter what. Jake and The Slaver HURTLE into each other, TUMBLE off a catwalk, CRASHING into conduits and GUNKY WATER below. Jake staggers up but The Slaver is HUGE -- SLAMS Jake bac the water. PINS A FOOT on his blaster arm -- CRUSHING IT. Jake HOWLS as The Slaver presses a series of those HIEROG MARKINGS on Jake's BRACELET -- the symbols LIGHT UP in an CODE -- and KA-CHING! The bracelet POPS OF.E. The Slaver TOSSES IT into the gunky water. Draws his LASE -- WHUP-SNAP! The white-hot tip LASHES JAKE'S BACK, rippi shirt and BURN-SCARRING HIS BACK! Jake SCREAMS in agony as The Slaver WHIPS HIM MERCILESSLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Scout Ship SCREAMS down out of the cloud, toward the

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outlaws and Apaches finish off the wounded, TOMAHAWKS RIP AWAY TENTACLED SCALPS! Carnage and joy -- but then: A MONSTROUS SHADOW spreads over the battlefield. Everyone up to see the SCOUT SHIP PLUMMETING DOWN --

dialogues.speaker: GREY WOLF, (SUBTITLE)
dialogues.text: Fall back!!! NOW!! NOW!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another LASER WHIP SNAP and Jake seems DONE. Now The Slav LIFTS Jake from the water, CRUSHING his wind-pipe. Jake FLAILS, REACHING for something BELOW FRAME... finall and STABS it into The Slaver's side. The Alien ROARS in p and looks down to see --

dialogues.speaker: SIDE. IT STARTS TO GLOW BLUE WITH A HIGH-PITCH WHINE
dialogues.text: JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go to hell.

dialogues.speaker: FREEZES TO GREY STONE. EXPLODING IN A MILLION PIECES
dialogues.text: Jake DROPS, GASPING. Revenge fulfilled. Painfully starts CLIMBING a ladder back to the upper deck --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the humans FLEE from the fort, the remaining aliens RE to the last shuttles for ESCAPE... start to LIFT OFF... But find themselves SMASHING into the ENORMOUS HULL of th as_it crashe _down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jake FALLS into the seat beside Ella, straps in. Fighting controls, she SEES THE WHIP MARKS on his back. It TEARS h heart open. And because this might be the end... she ADMI ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I lied. JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I know. ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, I heard what you said when I was layin' there...
JAKE. Taken aback. LAID BARE. As she says: ELLA (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are a good man. At least... to me. The ground GROWS BIGGER out the window. Her HAND reaches for his. JAKE'S HAND clasps hers and --

dialogues.speaker: A HALF-MILE BEFORE SLOWLY COMING TO A FINAL, WRENCHING...
dialogues.text: The frame is WHITE with dust and SUNSHINE. As from the et comes... EMMETT, HAPPY, and DOC, with GREY WOLF's arm slung over h shoulder. Among other faces, White and Apache... all of t PROUD WARRIORS. Staring in awe at: THE CRASHED ALIEN SHIP. DUG DEEP INTO THE CANYON FLOOR. Something starts to rain down. Looks at first like glitte until we realize it's GOLD DUST. From an OPENING in the Scout Ship, the sound of THUNDERIN HOOVES as... ALL THE ANIMALS STAMPEDE OUT. Then, slowly.. HUNDREDS OF PEOPLE emerge, dazed -- their minds slowly WA UP. White and Kiowa-Apache ABDUCTEES. DOC RUSHES IN, searching faces -- no -- no -- no -- n-- THERE she is, his BELOVED MARIA, stumbling weakly toward tears runs down her cheek. He EMBRACES her madly, kissing inch of her face as... EMMETT pushes through the crowd, sees SHERIFF TAGGART -- EMMETT

dialogues.speaker: PAW
dialogues.text: The kid GRABS his father and holds him for dear life, as stares back in a daze -- EMMETT (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's me -- it's Emmett. And somewhere in there, RECOGNITION comes to the Sheriff' eyes... Emmett SMILES and throws his arms around his fath again as --

dialogues.speaker: THE TOWNSFOLK OF ABSOLUTION AND THE APACHES FIND EACH OTH
dialogues.text: Families, lovers, friends... reunited.
COLORADO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Moving through the FALLEN BODIES toward the lifeless form Dolarhyde, his FATHER. Eyes welling, he drops to his knee

dialogues.speaker: A VOICE, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Nat? Colorado turns -- it's PERCY. Confused. Like waking from dream. Sees his father on the ground... PERCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What... happened? And all Colorado can say is... NAT COLORADO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's dead. That HANGS there. Percy blinks. And then -- PERCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's gettin' the ranch? ON COLORADO. At first, words that don't compute. Then PUR BLIND RAGE takes hold and his FISTS FLY, PUNCHING PERCY:

dialogues.speaker: HEY
dialogues.text: Colorado WHIRLS -- DOLARHYDE IS STAGGERING TO HIS FEET, A DOLARHYDE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one's gettin' my ranch. Stunned, Colorado GRINS. Percy spits blood, points accusi PERCY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Paw, he-- Dolarhyde SMACKS Percy across the face: PERCY (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OW!!! What'd you do that for? UOLARHYUE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For being an ungrateful little bastard. Now shake your brother's hand and thank him for saving your ass, cause it's more than you ever would'a done bjM.
Chastened, Percy glowers at Colorado. Grudgingly reaches hand. So does Nat. As they SHAKE -- DOLARHYDE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's better. JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Staggers through the crowd. And sees ELLA. Thgy did it. B she still looks TROUBLED. Staring out at the vast desert. JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: . what is it? ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We didn't get all of 'em. Some ran oft. That LANDS on Jake, as he too looks toward the endless ho HOLD on them, together, a VICTORIOUS but UNRESOLVED note. We RISE UP over the sea of bodies and the CRASHED SHIP, u Jake and Ella are just two small figures in the crowd... FADE TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A glorious sight: Absolution in REBIRTH -- FLUSH from all GOLD. Storefronts brightly painted, the streets ALIVE. We PICK UP EMMETT running through the hustle and bustle w APACHE KIDS. Suddenly, DOLARHYDE, COLORADO and their gang in. SHERIFF TAGGART emerges from his office with DEPUTY W SHERIFF TAGGART

dialogues.speaker: EMMETT
dialogues.text: EMMETT

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- what? What'd I dQ?

dialogues.speaker: SHERIFF TAGGART EMMETT
dialogues.text: Get outta the road before you're run down! If your (overlapping) momma saw y-- -- "saw me playin' in the street she'd roll over in her grave and shoot lightnin' bolts outta her eyes," I know, I know! He runs off. Taggart SMIRKS: SHERIFF TAGGART

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kid's got a mouth on him.
DEPUTY WADE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, Kyle, considering he saved your life, guess you'll just have to grin'n bear it. Dolar moves up to Taggart, tough as ever. The men HOLD lo SHERIFF TAGGART

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Woodrow. DOLARHYDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kyle. Percy STEWS about something. Dolar WHACKS him upside the DOLARHYDE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go_ _on. Grudgingly, Percy hands Taggart a SHEAF OF PAPER -- SHERIFF TAGGART

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's this? DOLARHYDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Claims to the land 50 miles west of here. I've signed it over to the township of Absolution. (off Taggart's LOOK) Considering I'm a businessman, I figure expansion's in both our interests. Needs the Sheriff's signature to be official. SHERIFF TAGGART

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fifty miles west of here is where the goldmine is, Woodrow. DOLARHYDE (A BEAT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That so. With surprise, Taggart studies the paper. SMILES: SHERIFF TAGGART

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's this about twenty percent going to the Apaches? Dolarhyde glances at Colorado. A moment. But the hardened rancher maintains his rock-solid facade: DOLARHYDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Figure the only way not to piss 'em off is to buy 'em. SHERIFF TAGGART

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Since when'd you worry about pissin' anyone off?
DOLARHYDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just sign it, Goddamnit. With a grin, Taggart gestures for Deputy Wade to turn aro flattens the paper on his BACK, using it as a surface to SHERIFF TAGGART

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd say you were being generous, Woodrow, but I know you'd just be insulted. DOLARHYDE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn right. Dolar gives his hat a TIP, then mounts up to go -- and we UP to the UPPER FLOOR of the GOLD LEAF SALOON, in the pro being rebuilt in grand style -- and MOVE IN on a WINDOW w

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DOC AND MARIA burst through a door, tearing passionately other's CLOTHES -- Maria MOANS as Doc kisses her neck: DOC MARIA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SHH! The workers will hear us!!! Let them hear! As they TUMBLE back onto the bed, Doc LURCHES. Reaches un his back to find... a GOLD POCKETWATCH. DOC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this? MARIA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at the inscription. He flips it open to find an ENGRAVING: "MI CORAZON... POR SIEMPRE." Doc looks up at her, MOVED. Then -- PLAYFULLY: DOC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This looks like Aldo Mayberry's watch... MARIA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut up and kiss me. She pulls him down, OUT OF FRAME --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hand unties a HORSE from its tether bar -- it's JAKE. S bags packed. A BARK turns him around... HAPPY. Yipping fo Jake to FOLLOW. He GRINS. As MUSIC begins to RISE -- HOPE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a LONG SHOT -- the distant SILHOUETTES of Happy BOUNDI through the shallow TWIN RIVERS, Jake following on horseb

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Jake approaches, APACHE SENTRIES emerge from rocks to outsiders away. Jake TIPS his hat and they nod, let him p He nears the bluff where ELLA, GREY WOLF, and the rest of Apaches finish laying DYNAMITE DET CORD that trails down the canyon. Ella hears Happy BARKING -- turns to see her with Jake. She smiles as he rides up, dismounts: ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Second damn time that dog ran off on me. JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Second time he brought me to you. Happy's tail wags. The look between Jake and Ella HOLDS. it seems freighted with everything. Finally, he breaks it glancing at the Apaches finishing their work with the dyn and the remnants of the ALIEN SHIP and FORTRESS below. JAKE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like you got everything set. Ella eyes Jake's horse, loaded with GEAR. Looks up, clear DISAPPOINTED: ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where you headed? JAKE (A BEAT)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got some messes to clean up. But she looks at him. fEADI.NG liim. wryly: ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Messes. JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Yep. (then; off her look) What. She walks right up to his horse. Right up to HIM: ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think you're ridin' off cause you're just scared of what'll happen if you stay. An INFERENCE here. Ella's going BOLD. Jake swings off his horse, lands beside her. Now. Almost CURIOUS: JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And what's gonna happen?
She steps CLOSER to him... INTIMATE: ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know. A CHARGE between them. All they wanna do is KISS... But that'd be too easy. And those wounds of his, they hav quite healed. He drops his eyes; SOFTLY NOW: JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I stay... it's not gonna be good for anybody, Ella. A beat. She looks off. Nods. They say nothing. And now he slowly climbs back on his horse. Ella TOUGHENS: ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heard some rumors outta Abilene. Weird noises at night. Cattle mutilations. Weather phenomena. Figured I'd ride down there. Give it a look-see. JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (his eyes narrow) What's 'phenomena'? ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Big storms in places that don't get big storms. ON JAKE. Every fighting instinct in him suddenly IGNITED, though he plays it down: JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You goin' down there yourself? ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why? You worried about me? You bet your ass he is. But, he shakes his head-- JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, ma'am. You can take care of yourself just fine. (then; tips his hat) Be seein' you around. ELLA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: goodbye, Jake. He gets back on his horse. Starts to ride off. Happy BARK trots alongside him. BARK BARK BARK. In dog that means "D be an idiot." Jake glances over --
JAKE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get the hell away from me, you damn mutt. (BARK, BARK)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go on, GET. He heels his horse, leaving Happy behind to WHINE. Jake rides off into the sunset. But his heart's KICKING i chest. And this is pretty much where things usually end.. But. Jake pulls the REINS as he SIGHS. Turns the horse ar TROTS back to Ella, whose smile WIDENS as he closes the g between them. Finally STOPS right in front of her. And despite his best effort to stay TOUGH... he just plain likes her: JAKE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Abilene happens to be on my way. He reaches out a hand... she takes it... as he PULLS HER THE SADDLE. Ella grinning ear-to-ear as she folds her arm around his waist. Jake -- ever the outlaw -- grumbles: JAKE (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop smiling, Goddammit. He KICKS the horse and Happy follows. Ella shoots a goodb look to Grey Wolf, who NODS. Signals his men and FUSES AR The DYNAMITE FUSES ssssssnake down the mountain -- reachi canyon floor -- INTO those limestone tunnels where CLUSTE DYNAMITE have been placed... and as FUSE MEETS EXPLOSIVE:

dialogues.speaker: JAKE AND ELLA CRESTING A HILL
dialogues.text: THUNDER of EXPLOSIONS makes them rear. They turn back to

dialogues.speaker: EVIDENCE OF THE ALIEN SHIP AND 'Q T.
dialogues.text: Ella folds her arms TIGHTER around Jake, her heart full. nod of private affirmation, he spurs the horse with a HYA As the canyon behind them fills with rushing water, Jake Ella ride hard into the fiery sunset... Away from the past, toward a future full of promise. FADE OUT.
